text: I am Javiera Valenzuela,
I am currently Regional Product Owner at Cencosud.
Cencosud is a multi-format retailer
where you can find department stores,
supermarkets, and home improvement

with a presence in five countries: Chile,
Brazil, Colombia, Peru, and Argentina.
Cencosud's mission today
is to deliver a memorable customer experience.

As a result, personalization is becoming
more and more relevant every day.
We have different types of users.
Therefore, it's key to have a service,
a recommendation engine

that adapts to the needs
that exist today in the market,

to the needs of the client
to facilitate and improve the results,
which is what we are looking to do.
We realized that the Amazon Personalize service, AWS,
had more freedom in terms of data;
it could be much more customizable.

Today we find ourselves with solutions that,
although very good,

it is necessary to have
something more customized
to allow us to move faster.
The ability to adapt a solution

to multiple types of business
with different objectives
and at a significant speed.

In some of the businesses, we noticed that 
the average ticket click through rate

and the average price
were impacted by almost 26%,
mainly in supermarkets.
We also observed that if we compared

the CTR we had
when we used manual solutions
with Amazon Personalize,
we reached an increase of 600%.

In terms of ROI,
return on investment,
we got 400%.

Creating an extensive infrastructure
is unnecessary,

but you can build
a small solution in a couple of weeks
and scale up to something more significant.

So therefore, it allows us to generate
immediate results.

Today we are working
with Colombia, Argentina, and Peru;
we are just starting.

The idea is also to move forward
with Brazil in the next few months,

but there is still a lot to do,
and there is still a lot to standardize;

obviously, the idea is to reach
the same levels

and the same results of satisfaction
that we had in Chile.

For us, it is essential today
to have the tools
that significantly improve users' lives.

So it is not only about selling, but also
about making sure that the experience,
the time spent on the site is quality time,

that they can quickly find
what they are looking for,

and in the end this has
a direct impact on their personal lives.
